amendment.description: Amendment increases and then decreases the Centennial Challenge funding by $30 million in order to fund the program at the level requested by the President.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase and then decrease the Centennial Challenge by $30 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tsongas amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Tsongas.
